version_description:
Fixed bugs:
- Fixed bug when app crashes after login when very slow network and Docker module is not supported.

New features:
- Dark / Light mode support for iOS 13
- UI improved and optimized for iOS 13
- Better module grid layout for iPad
- New “Clear logs” button added to Logs module
Fixed bugs:
- Fixed QuickConnect login error for some environments
- Stability improvements and other bug fixes

Improving small things before big update (v3.0) :).
Improved QuickConnect resolver.
Added button to send feedback directly from login screen.

Improved QuickConnect resolver.
Added button to send feedback directly from login screen.

Completely improved design, experience and added new features.

General:
- You can now reorder modules.
- Copy any value to clipboard just by holding finger on it.
- Perform any action just by holding finger on any Package, Task, Docker Container....

Settings:
- You can now set your preferred Language for the app.
- You can now adjust "Dark mode" setting independently on system.

Network module:
- New "Network interfaces" section.

Storage module:
- New "External devices" section.
- You can "eject" any external device right from the Storage module.

Logs module:
- New Logs filter by its category.

Scheduled tasks module:
- You can check "Run results" for the tasks now.
- New Tasks filter by its state.

Docker containers module:
- New action "Clear" for Docker containers.
- New containers filter by its state.

More features coming soon.

You can now secure your Login history with Touch ID or Face ID.
New option to delete items form Login history added.
Turn off / Restart feature for System info module is again available directly from Dashboard.
Lot of internal improvements and fixes (Thank You all for the feedback).

Multiple Windows support on iPadOS! - Now you can manage multiple Synology NAS servers in several windows in parallel.

New:
- Option to reload system and UPS info from System module.
- Improved design of Network graph and Storage graph.

Fixed: 
- Login credentials were not saved when no manual port number was provided.
- Other small fixes and improvements.
